Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to summary judgment proceedings to recover possession of real property in non-payment proceedings in the city of New York; repealer
Summary: Relates to providing additional protections to tenants in summary judgment proceedings to recover possession of real property in non-payment proceedings in the city of New York.
LawSection: Real Property Actions and Proceedings Law
LawCode: Amd ยง745, rpld ยง747-a, RPAP L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property actions and proceedings law, in relation to summary proceedings to recover possession of real property; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating to judgments in non-payment proceedings in the city of New York
